title: In a High-Stakes Summit, Trump Hands Putin a Victory Without a Fight
description: A lack of clear results empowers Putin to carry on with the war as usual, experts told The Moscow Times.

title: Hungary and Slovakia Say Russian Oil Deliveries Halted After Ukrainian Pipeline Strike
description: Hungarian Foreign Minister Peter Szijjarto said technicians were working to restore a transformation station critical to the Druzhba pipeline’s operations...

title: Explained: How Russia Is Cracking Down on the Internet and Messaging Apps
description: Lawmakers have approved fines for searching for “extremist” content and advertising VPNs as authorities mull a potential WhatsApp ban.

title: Sun, Sea and the Russian Flag: Inside Vacation Season on the Beaches of Occupied Ukraine
description: Russia is promoting summer getaways to occupied seaside towns as part of a broader push to normalize control over territory it seized by force.

title: ‘A Revolution in Drone Warfare’: As Russian Fiber-Optic Drones Flood the Battlefield, Ukraine Scrambles to Catch Up
description: The race for fiber-optic drones is one example of how the war in Ukraine has become one of adaptation and innovation.

description: Lawmakers have approved fines for searching for “extremist” content and advertising VPNs as authorities mull a potential WhatsApp ban.

description: The race for fiber-optic drones is one example of how the war in Ukraine has become one of adaptation and innovation.

title: Russia’s Pro-War Bloggers See ‘Humiliation’ in Putin-Trump Summit
description: Bloggers voiced frustration with the talks — and fears that they, too, could fall victim to tightening censorship and persecution if the war ends.

title: In Ukraine’s Donbas, a Vital Highway Under Siege — And the Soldiers Trying to Shield It
description: As Putin and Trump prepare to meet and Russia presses forward in Donetsk, a team of Ukrainian soldiers works to keep a strategic artery open.
